job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the core activity of creating software.
Maintaining code quality is a fundamental aspect of software development and integration.
Writing tests is an integral part of the software development lifecycle to ensure functionality and reliability.

job_tasks.phrase: manage the continuous integration of code
job_tasks.justification: Continuous integration is a key practice in software operations and deployment pipelines.
Supporting architects involves contributing to the design and development of software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Are the Lead software engineer, guiding other back- and front-end developers in developing a feature-rich product for our employees.
job_tasks.justification: Leading and guiding other developers in product development is a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Understand how to technically scale the services in the 'employee experience platform'
job_tasks.justification: Technical scaling of services is a critical aspect of robust software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Understand how to combine best agile development practices in combination with a services-based architecture.
job_tasks.justification: Applying agile practices and understanding service-based architecture are core software engineering concepts.

job_tasks.phrase: Everything we build in the app is scalable
job_tasks.justification: Scalability is a key requirement and task in software development.
Microservices architecture is a software development pattern.
Kubernetes is used for orchestrating and managing applications, fitting within the broader software development and deployment context.
CI/CD pipelines are essential for the operational aspects of software delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: We work in small increments so we're able to put things live straight away, hence reduce our time to market.
job_tasks.justification: Working in small increments and reducing time to market are practices within software development.

job_tasks.phrase: are the technical point of contact for product owners and heads of tech.
job_tasks.justification: Acting as a technical point of contact requires understanding business needs and communicating technical aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: As a Senior engineer you have an impact on the direction of the (technical) part of the app.
job_tasks.justification: Having an impact on technical direction implies strategic input and understanding of business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: And the way we work in this project is a blueprint for other teams in our Retail Tech Platform.
job_tasks.justification: Setting a blueprint for other teams indicates a strategic contribution and understanding of broader organizational goals.

soft_skills.phrase: Beyond your own team, you contribute to the AH Tech community via Guilds, inner source initiatives, and more.
though you can also liaise with other senior engineers and their respective technologies
We work in a multi-disciplinarian team
Therefore, we encourage you to share knowledge and best practices with other teams.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement exclusively details core software engineering tasks, responsibilities, and technologies. There is no mention of AI, Machine Learning, Generative AI, LLMs, or related concepts. The role focuses on building, scaling, and maintaining a backend platform, which aligns perfectly with the definition of a 'Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is exceptionally clear and specific about the technical responsibilities and technologies involved. The absence of any AI/ML-related terms makes the classification unambiguous.
